amendment.description: Amendment sought to terminate current spending on TV and Radio commercials being aired to promote the NFIP in all 50 states and direct remaining funds to be used to pay down NFIP's debt.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 112-138 to terminate current spending on TV and Radio commercials being aired to promote the NFIP in all 50 states and directs remaining funds to pay down NFIP's debt. The amendment would continue FEMA's mailing programs that are used to notify current policy holders of changes to their policies and maps as well as other educational publications they produce.
